entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 01:33 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -34.6°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
